title: Demand for some food and consumer goods surges 500% as Canadians stock up
description: Despite the rush, vast majority of companies confident in their ability to manage logistics, freight and supply
content: Food and consumer goods manufacturers reported a surge in demand in the last two weeks of March as home bound Canadians rushed to grocery stores to stock up for an indefinite period of self isolation to combat the spread of COVID Eighty per cent of manuf chars
